document_data.name: Omgar
document_data.mainbody: '''Omgar''' was a great [[sea drake]] who lived in the [[Great Sea]] along the peninsula named for himâ€“the [[Snout of Omgar]].
document_data.Activities: Omgar laired in a cave on the peninsula's southern tip in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Omgar exacted heavy tolls on passing ships depending on his mood. Most of the sailors would rather pay his toll that risk bypassing his lair and foundering on the [[Beacon Rocks]] nearby.
document_data.History: It was unknown what became of Omgar after the peninsula that bore his home was split apart from [[Chult]] following the [[Spellplague]], and transformed into an isle onto itself.
